name: undeciphered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having been read or understood: They are keen to analyse other undeciphered ancient scripts, such as the Bronze Age petroglyphs from Scandinavia. A common writing system was used, which remains undeciphered.
More examplesFewer examplesOne of the two texts once on the monument is still undeciphered.The earliest Egyptian hieroglyphics and other major writing systems remain undeciphered, with no breakthroughs in sight.He gave a lecture on the undeciphered Minoan scripts found on tablets excavated at palace sites in Crete.
